plugin.name: pdf-viewer
plugin.author: Hitesh,Ankur
plugin.title: Google Doc Pdf Viewer
plugin.description:
\ Provides intigration with Google-Doc Pdf Viewer for opening pdf in Google Doc pdf viewer. Sample App for this plugin is available at Git : Grails-Google-PDF-Viewer-Demo
Documentation can be found at http://github.com/IntelliGrape/Grails-Google-PDF-Viewer-Demo/wiki/-Grails-Google-PDF-Viewer-Demo-
